subject: Re: Order #SSN5016 confirmed
description_text:
Hello

I have made an order ( SSN5016) on the 18th of December with express shipping. Today i received the clutch pedal.

I have also ordered the HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode shifter. On your site stated that the shifter will be shipped on the 19th of December, so i was expecting it.

Can you provide an estimate delivery?


Best regards,

Jarno diekerhoff
